title: Recover Army: Damaged
description: When an army endures ill fortune, it can become afflicted by negative conditions. You can use the Recover Army activity to work at removing an affliction with a basic skill check.

criticalSuccess.msg: You increase its HP by 2 up to its maximum.

success.msg: You increase its HP by 1 up to its maximum.

failure.msg: You fail to remove the affliction.

criticalFailure.msg: You fail to remove the affliction and your soldierâ€™s lowered morale spreads discontent; <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>.
